cases.title: Chat- Log into Messenger
cases.description: This test case check if functionality of chat works properly. The user should be able to log into Messenger
cases.preconditions:
1. Use Brave browser

2. Load the URL - https://teodor.bg/

3. The user is logged in his facebook account in the same broser
cases.postconditions: The user is logged in messenger and able to chat with support.

steps.action: Click on messenger button on the right bottom
steps.expected_result: The button is clicked and “Chat with TEODOR” menu is opened.
The user is logged into Messenger and able to chat.

cases.title: Chat as Guest
cases.description: This test case check if functionality of chat works properly.

cases.title: Open Cart
cases.preconditions:
1. Use Brave browser

2. Website is open - teodor.bg

3. The user is logged in.
cases.postconditions: User is redirected to - https://teodor.bg/checkout/cart/

steps.expected_result: User is redirected to - https://teodor.bg/checkout/car

cases.title: Forget profile
cases.description: This test case checks functionality to forget profile.
cases.preconditions:
1. Use Brave browser;

2. The website is opened - teodor.bg

3. The user have registered profile.

4. The user is logged-in.
cases.postconditions: The user profile is deleted, user is sign-out and redirected to teodor.bg

steps.expected_result: User is redirected to account page.
User is redirected to “Управление на лични данни”

steps.action: Scroll down and click on “Искане да бъдете забравени“
steps.expected_result: User is redirected to confirmation to delete page

steps.action: Click the checkbox and click “ПРОЧЕТОХ И СЕ СЪГЛАСЯВАМ“
steps.expected_result: User is redirected to main page and user account is forgotten.
